contract integrates with Chainlink price feed aggregators to fetch on-chain prices. It includes functionalities for fallback prices, staleness checks, and calculating the value of LP tokens based on their underlying reserves and prices. It is owned and configurable by an admin. This contract is upgradeable.","errors":{"InvalidAmount()":[{"details":"Thrown for generic invalid amount errors, typically when an amount is illogical in its feed returns incomplete or invalid round data."}],"OI_InvalidDeviationBPS()":[{"details":"Thrown when the deviation BPS parameter is invalid (e.g., > 100%)."}],"OI_InvalidPriceFeed()":[{"details":"Thrown if a price feed aggregator is determined to be invalid during verification."}],"OI_LPNotRegistered()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to get the price from a primary feed is zero or negative."}],"OI_NoPriceSource()":[{"details":"Thrown when no valid price source (primary or fallback) is available for a token."}],"OI_PriceTooOld()":[{"details":"Thrown during price feed verification if the latest price is too old."}],"OI_StalenessThresholdZero()":[{"details":"Thrown when the staleness threshold is set It reverts if no valid price source is available.","params":{"token":"The address of the token."},"returns":{"isFallback":"True if the fallback price was used.","lastUpdatedAt":"The timestamp of the returned price data.","price":"The price of the token, scaled to 1e18."}},"initialize(address,uint256)":{"details":"Sets the initial owner and staleness threshold. Can only be called once.","params":{"initialOwner_":"The address of the initial owner.","initialStalenessThreshold_":"The initial staleness threshold in seconds."}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"registerLPToken(address,address,address)":{"details":"This is required to calculate the LP token's value. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setFallbackPrice(address,uint256)":{"details":"This price is used if the primary Chainlink feed is stale or fails.","params":{"newPrice":"The new fallback price, scaled to 1e18 decimals. price.","params":{"maxDeviationBps":"The maximum allowed deviation in basis points.","priceToValidate":"The price to check.","token":"The address of the token."},"returns":{"isValid":"True if the price is within the allowed deviation."}}},"stateVariables":{"HASH_REASON_BELOW_MIN":{"details":"A keccak256 hash of a reason string, used for efficient comparison to save gas."},"HASH_REASON_FETCH_FAILED":{"details":"A keccak256 hash of a reason string, used for efficient comparison to save gas."},"HASH_REASON_STALE":{"details":"A keccak256 hash of a reason string, used for efficient comparison to save gas."},"_fallbackPrices":{"details":"Manually set fallback prices for tokens, used if the primary feed is unavailable."},"_fallbackTimestamps":{"details":"Timestamps for when fallback prices were last updated."},"_lpTokenComposition":{"details":"Maps an LP token address to the addresses of its two underlying tokens."},"_minAcceptablePrice":{"details":"The minimum acceptable price value (in 1e18 precision) from any source."},"_priceFeedDecimals":{"details":"Maps a token address to the number of decimals its price feed uses."},"_priceFeeds":{"details":"Maps a token address to its primary Chainlink price feed aggregator address."},"_stalenessThreshold":{"details":"The maximum age of a price feed before it is considered stale."}},"title":"OracleIntegration","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"FallbackPriceUpdated(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a fallback constructor.details: Disables the regular constructor to make the contract upgradeable.

params.feedDecimals: The number of decimals the feed uses.

fetchAndReportTokenPrice(address).details: This function is intended to be called by off-chain keepers or monitoring services. It provides more detailed event logs about the state of the oracle.

returns.isFallback: True if the fallback price was used.
returns.lastUpdatedAt: The timestamp of the returned price data.
returns.price: The price of the token, scaled to 1e18.

params.lpToken: The address of the LP token.

returns.isRegistered_: True if the LP token is registered.
returns.token0Out_: The address of the first underlying token.
returns.token1Out_: The address of the second underlying token.

getLPTokenValue(address,uint256,uint256,.details: Fetches underlying token prices and decimals internally.

params.amountLP: The amount of LP tokens to value.
params.lpToken: The address of the LP token.
params.reserve0: The total reserve of token0 in the LP pair.
params.reserve1: The total reserve of token1 in the LP pair.
params.totalSupplyLP: The total supply of the LP token.

returns.value: The total value of the LP tokens, scaled to 1e18.

getLPTokenValueAlternative(uint256,uint2.details: Useful for off-chain calculations or when data is already available.

params.amountLP: The amount of LP tokens to value.
params.price0_1e18: The price of token0, scaled to 1e18.
params.price1_1e18: The price of token1, scaled to 1e18.
params.totalSupplyLP: The total supply of the LP token.

returns.value: The total value of the LP tokens, scaled to 1e18.

returns.fallbackTimestamp_: The timestamp of the last fallback price update.
returns.feedDecimals_: The decimals of the primary feed.
returns.isFeedAvailable_: True if a primary feed is set.
returns.priceFeedAddress_: The address of the primary price feed aggregator.

getTokenPrice(address).details: The price is always returned with 1e18 precision. It reverts if no valid price source is available.

returns.isFallback: True if the fallback price was used.
returns.lastUpdatedAt: The timestamp of the returned price data.
returns.price: The price of the token, scaled to 1e18.

initialize(address,uint256).details: Sets the initial owner and staleness threshold. Can only be called once.

params.initialOwner_: The address of the initial owner.
params.initialStalenessThreshold_: The initial staleness threshold in seconds.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerLPToken(address,address,address).details: This is required to calculate the LP token's value. Can be called by the owner or LiquidityManager.

params.lpToken: The address of the LP token.
params.token0: The address of the first underlying token.
params.token1: The address of the second underlying token.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFallbackPrice(address,uint256).details: This price is used if the primary Chainlink feed is stale or fails.

params.newPrice: The new fallback price, scaled to 1e18 decimals. Set to 0 to remove.

setLiquidityManagerAddress(address).details: The LiquidityManager is authorized to register LP tokens with this oracle.

params.newMinPrice: The new minimum price, scaled to 1e18 decimals.

setPriceFeed(address,address).details: Setting a new feed will verify its data. Removing a feed will preserve any existing fallback price.

params.priceFeedAggregator: The address of the Chainlink aggregator. Set to address(0) to remove.

params.newThreshold: The new staleness threshold in seconds. Use type(uint256).max to disable.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

validatePriceAgainstOracle(address,uint2.details: The deviation tolerance is halved if the oracle is using a fallback price.

params.maxDeviationBps: The maximum allowed deviation in basis points.

returns.isValid: True if the price is within the allowed deviation.

convertToStandardPrecision(uint256,uint8.notice: Converts a raw price from a feed to the standard 1e18 precision.

fetchAndReportTokenPrice(address).notice: Fetches the latest price and emits events for monitoring purposes.

getLPTokenInfo(address).notice: Retrieves the registered underlying composition of an LP token.

getLPTokenValue(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Calculates the total value of a given amount of LP tokens.

getLPTokenValueAlternative(uint256,uint2.notice: A pure function to calculate LP token value with all data provided as arguments.

getMinAcceptablePrice().notice: Gets the current minimum acceptable price.

getPriceFeedInfo(address).notice: Retrieves the price feed configuration for a token.

getStalenessThreshold().notice: Gets the current staleness threshold for price feeds.

getTokenPrice(address).notice: Gets the price of a token, using the primary feed first and then the fallback.

liquidityManagerAddress().notice: The address of the LiquidityManager, which has permission to register LP tokens.

registerLPToken(address,address,address).notice: Registers the underlying composition of an LP token.

setFallbackPrice(address,uint256).notice: Sets a manual fallback price for a token.

setLiquidityManagerAddress(address).notice: Sets the address of the LiquidityManager contract.

setMinAcceptablePrice(uint256).notice: Sets the minimum acceptable price from any source.

setPriceFeed(address,address).notice: Sets or removes the primary price feed aggregator for a token.

setStalenessThreshold(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum age for a price feed reading to be considered valid.

validatePriceAgainstOracle(address,uint2.notice: Validates if a given price is within an acceptable deviation from the oracle price.
